content: in english the dutch version was not tested so little typos may occur please contact me via email if you have found one or if you need help with the pattern aspoonfulofyarn@hotmail com * affiliate links if you buy your yarn via these links i will get a small commission but it won t cost you anything extra this way i can keep making free patterns 1 https //www etsy com/nl/listing/634225515/spotting-clouds-gehaakte-top-pdf ref=shop_home_active_1 2 http //www aspoonfulofyarn com/the-poetry-collection/ 3 http //shareasale com/r cfm b=819303&u=1720730&m=63378&urllink=www%2ewoolwarehouse%2eco%2euk%2fcatalogsearch%2fresult%2f%3fq%3dwhirlette%26order%3drelevance%26dir%3ddesc&afftrack=whirlettegeneral 4 http //shareasale com/r cfm b=819303&u=1720730&m=63378&urllink=www%2ewoolwarehouse%2eco%2euk%2fcatalogsearch%2fresult%2f%3fq%3dcatona%26order%3drelevance%26dir%3ddesc&afftrack=catonageneral 5 http //shareasale com/r cfm b=819303&u=1720730&m=63378&urllink=www%2ewoolwarehouse%2eco%2euk%2fcatalogsearch%2fresult%2f%3fq%3dwhirl%26order%3drelevance%26dir%3ddesc&afftrack=whirlgeneral
